description: This dataset details Capital Improvement Projects in the Chicago Southland region. It is a aggregation of Capital Improvement data from SSMMA, CMAP, IDOT, and Cook County.

metadata.attribution: South Suburban Mayors and Managers Association

name: SSMMA Capital Improvement Project
